name: Bubble Shooter (itch) (TheGamer)
description:
This is a game for the Mini Jam 84: Bubbles

You play as Bubble Boy, the last bubble boy in the world. You're going to avenge your family for the treacherous things that have been done by the Fireball minions. You know your life won't last long, so you better make it count.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left mouse button to shoot bubbles
